h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: Note! You won't be able to activate the Heart of Birthstone Keeper's Shrine here unless you die, but if you do, you won't need to go back to a previous shrine – you'll automatically be transported back here.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone'.
The content is as follows:
Note! You won't be able to activate the Heart of Birthstone Keeper's Shrine here unless you die, but if you do, you won't need to go back to a previous shrine – you'll automatically be transported back here.
